profile: Serving all of central Ontario from  The Muskokas -Peel Region- York Region - Dufferin Region -Simcoe Region - Georgetown -Milton , Closets by Design is the industry leader in custom manufactured organizational systems. We design, build and install custom closets, garage cabinets and flooring, home offices, laundries, pantries, and much more. From our no obligation in-home consultation, custom tailored designs, and the highest quality canadian product construction, our products offer the best value in the industry. Check us out at barrie.closetsbydesign.com.

profile: Welcome to Space Age Closets And Customer Cabinetry. Quality isn't expensive, it's priceless!  Space Age has been in business for over 30 years and we've evolved from simply organizing your closet to creating them from scratch.  We specialize in custom walk-in closets, custom reach-in closets, custom sliding doors, custom wall units, Murphy beds (wall beds), home offices, kitchen islands, floating shelves, and pop-up TV units.  The specialize in creating our cabinetry with Canadian materials.  We can beautify any room in your home, adding to your home's value and practicality.
service_area: We cater to an area that covers most of the GTA.  For locations further afield, we are able to ship our product.  Feel free to contact us for further information.

profile: Good news, homeowners: Replacing your interior doors, closet doors and closet organizers has never been easier or more affordable. One Day Doors & Closets' advanced 3D scanning technology makes it possible to replace your doors and closets for about 50% less than you'd pay using home improvement stores, handymen or contractors. Best of all, we're in and out in less than 4 hours. It's the best 'whole home improvement' you can make, for the cost, turnaround time, and the overall improvement throughout your home. No other project can update the look of your entire home as quickly and affordably without any messy, noisy or intrusive construction. We get in. We get out. You get a whole new look.

profile:
Our company specialized on design, manufacture and installation of all types of closet organizers and kitchen cabinets. 
Our goal is to make your home more comfortable and organized for any space and budget. 
Our top priority is a customer service â€“ we want happy clients! 
And we want you to come back to us again! 
Call or email us today and we will help you to organize your home.

Our Mission
Tired of stepping over the things on the floor ? 
Don't have enough space to put on new clothes and shoes ? 
Can't see the mess in children's rooms ? We can help ! Coziness and comfort - this is what we are here for !

Our Vision
Everyone wants to be at home. But to be in a cozy, well organized home is much more attractive. 
When you have a party with your friends and relatives or sell your house - it always works to make a great impression on people. 
Remember, the coziness and comfort are the main things that everybody is looking for in life. 
You can be in two equal houses, but you will never come back to the messy one. 
Do you want to make your home the place everyone would like to return to ? 
Call us today and we can make it happen !

FOR A FREE ESTIMATE CALL
416-839-8012

profile:
We are specialized in the production of fine kitchen cabinets, custom shelving, and high-end closet storage solutions . We are confident in the products we make, as well as the services we provide, on every project will suit your vision.

20 years of experience
Our 20 years of experience led to remodeling any kitchen, wall unit, home office, or walk-in closet style you like

Whether meeting with you and your family or collaborating with architects, contractors, and interior decorators, weâ€™re here to help you define your scope of work and articulate a vision thatâ€™s uniquely yours.


The experienced design team will turn your vision into a reality detailed plan, creating custom solutions that blend form a function to fit all your familyâ€™s needs.

Build
Our designs of combining the old and the new world approach to the top of craftsmanship and that mean you can have the best rich design from both worlds for kitchens or bathrooms. We make every piece of cabinetry in our shop in Toronto, Proudly 100% Canadian-made. To this regard, we offer a warranty against defects in materials and/or workmanship for a period of two years under average residential usage.  

Our Values
We believe in building durable and functional cabinetry that will make things easy to store, easy to find, and easy to clean. By choosing to work with us you will get the real value for your investment and your cabinets will look as good up close as they do from a distance.
